tool_description: An API used to access data about search trends on Google based on specific keywords.
name: Google Trends
title: Google Trends

api_list.name: keyword
api_list.description: An API used to access data about search trends on Google based on specific keywords.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-trends9.p.rapidapi.com/digital marketing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-trends9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-trends9.p.rapidapi.com/{keyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-trends9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
